thread.title: SAG Awards: Actors Defend Their Right to Battle ‘Fear, Self-Centeredness and Exclusivity’ and Lend Their Voice to the Resistance
thread.title_full: SAG Awards: Actors Defend Their Right to Battle ‘Fear, Self-Centeredness and Exclusivity’ and Lend Their Voice to the Resistance

author: Michael Schneider
title: SAG Awards: Actors Defend Their Right to Battle ‘Fear, Self-Centeredness and Exclusivity’ and Lend Their Voice to the Resistance
text: President Trump's executive order banning certain people from entering the country was top of mind as winners like Mahershala Ali told personal stories of tolerance.
